## envtab remove

Remove envtab loadout(s)

### Synopsis

Remove envtab loadout(s)

```
envtab remove LOADOUT_NAME [LOADOUT_NAME ...] [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  envtab remove myloadout
  envtab remove myloadout1 myloadout2 myloadout3
```
